website_summaries.verdict: Volley-Lite ball is the perfect option for younger players, as it's softer and lighter.
pros: Ball is offered in more than a dozen color combinations that kids will like
Soft synthetic cover helps young players learn the game without pain
Lightweight ball works well for young and novice players
Even with lightweight design, ball is regulation size
cons: Only works for indoor use, and cover may get damaged if it becomes wet

customer_reviews.title: Finally a volleyball my 7 year old can really enjoy! I absolutely love this ball
customer_reviews.text: Finally a volleyball my 7 year old can really enjoy! I absolutely love this ball. I have tried several different balls, including a Wilson Soft Play and they were just too heavy and hurt my daughter's arms. This ball is amazing! It's light, there is no sting when it hits your arms, and it has the feel of a regulation volleyball. I highly suggest this volleyball for kids and even adult beginners that don't like heaviness and sting of other volleyballs.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for kids under 12 - soft feel - easy on their arms - and cute colors
customer_reviews.text: The Tachikara Lite is a great ball. Keep in mind it comes uninflated (in case this is a gift, or you don't have a pump). I've used Tachikara's as well as Molten's for 12 and under balls. They have a very soft feel that is easy on their arms. It has that composite "spongy" feel (compared to the leather balls). My girls love it! I also ordered a blue ball, and it arrived already inflated. It is the same ball that I can tell. Can't go wrong with Tachikara's!
customer_reviews.author: Toodles!

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air
customer_reviews.text: The ball was light and felt good for about three games. Now it wont stay inflated for a full game. Its only a few ten year old kids playing. I'm not sure if I just got a bad ball or if they are really that bad but I am not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBugCookies78418

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hurt a bit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for young ones (or anyone, really) learning how to play the game. I bought one of those "soft" Wilson balls to teach my daughter how to play and OUCH! I hated using it myself as it hurt my arms just passing the ball. This Volley Lite does not hurt at all and still performs great. It's also easier to learn how to set and serve overhand since it's not quite as heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great quality volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Great quality volleyball, has held up well to outdoor play at an elementary school. Perfect for my daughter to practice her skills at school and home when not at official practice.
customer_reviews.author: K.F.

customer_reviews.title: Great but you have to pump it yourself
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and recommended by my daughter’s club volleyball coaches. It’s much softer than the Wilson brand that we initially bought at Walmart. Very durable too. The only downfall is that it arrives flat so you’d need to pump it up yourself...and have some idea of how much air to pump in. I needed to ask the coaches to do that for me, which is why I only gave it 4 of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: kd

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great volleyball for beginners. My daughter is 6, and she loves trying to bump and set with this ball versus Wilson balls that are much harder. Soft exterior doesn't hurt little arms. Seems to be a little smaller than a standard ball, which also helps for littles trying the sport for the first time. Worth the spend versus cheaper, harder volleyballs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeralee85

customer_reviews.title: Durable, lightweight, great entry ball for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect training ball for young players (8-10). Light enough it doesn't hurt their arms too much yet provides a very similar feel to an actual ball. Kids love it and use it inside and out for practice. Holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: LivingNWLife

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: Feels great. So much easier on the wrists than a traditional ball and even other soft volleyballs, and perfect for my 10 year old. I was her volleyball coach and there were girls on the team that got different brands, and while this one was more expensive it was definitely worth the extra cost. Most of the girls on the team with other brands that were “soft” ended up either buying this brand or sharing with another girl on the team with this brand. The ball was just so much gentler on their wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Edgar

customer_reviews.title: My favorite volleyball-great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Received this volleyball and am very pleased. My son’s elementary school uses this brand. It’s much lighter than a standard ball and much easier for kids to use. I actually prefer it to other volleyballs. The outside is a soft leather, not a shiny plastic. The assortment of colors is awesome. I love this ball. You will be pleased with your order too.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R. Semenick

customer_reviews.title: super soft, no sting!
customer_reviews.text: Yes this ball is for youth...but if you're just playing for fun (like me) the light ball is super helpful. No red arms at the end of the game. Its soft to the touch. The material is not slick so there is no "slap" on your skin when you hit it with your hand or arms. Love the color. I received the pink and white ball. <3 THIS COMES DEFLATED. Its easy to pump up though. Enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: lynne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter ball
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and light. This is the same ball our kids' rec league uses so it is nice to keep the consistency for practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: Abbynichole

customer_reviews.title: Great ball... soft and painless!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the BEST volleyball for beginners. My daughters entire team loves her ball, the coaches prefer to borrow this one for practice. It is easy on their arms/wrists. No red marks after.
customer_reviews.author: Graham08

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners! Exactly what my new VB player needed.
customer_reviews.text: Love this volleyball! Made introducing VB to my daughter so much easier and no sore forearms! I warned her about the first few days (remembering how red and sore my arms were 40-ish years ago), but this soft and lite ball eliminated the chance of pain all together!!
customer_reviews.author: jrm37'fugitive

customer_reviews.title: exactly like my daughter has in her volleyball class
customer_reviews.text: this is the ball to have in case you have kids that learns the game (also for adults) very good quality this is what they use in tournaments where my kids play. a bit pricy compare to the ones in Walmart but the quality is not even close. this is the real deal. the one in departement store will not last a month. very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Maria perel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Four Square
customer_reviews.text: We have tried all sorts of balls for four square (including balls labeled 4 square balls.) NONE of the other balls can compare to this ball. It is PERFECT for four square. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners! Love this ball!
customer_reviews.text: This ball has been great. My daughter has been playing for 2 hours today. Regular game balls are so hard, my other daughters gave up because the first 30 min hurt so bad. New players can develop skills before they get discouraged and want to give up... because of the pain. Hopefully she will transition well to a game ball and be ready to play.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W. Potts

customer_reviews.title: Light and soft
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter who is an up and coming volleyball star on her 7-13 year old volleyball club! She says it’s softer and lighter than the official game balls, which give her more confidence when practicing her overhand serves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice look not good for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: purchased in summer and already breaking apart but good color and nice look for kids to see because it stands out unlike white or gray nets that easily turn brown after being outside for a while
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Light, soft, great volleyball for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. Light and soft. I bought for my 10 yr old for her volleyball practice and she never complain stings on the arms. I compared this ball and wilson softplay and found this one is much softer. I think it is great for kids to practice without too much pain, otherwise they might start to hate volleyball.
customer_reviews.author: James L

customer_reviews.title: The best practice ball
customer_reviews.text: These balls are the best for long practice as they won't beat you up like the heavier game balls. Especially good for 10 year olds that are learning the game. My daughter likes to practice every day and this ball makes it much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Batman97045

customer_reviews.title: Soft touch vball
customer_reviews.text: It is so nice to play with this ball. Bumping, setting and hitting it is a great ball for younger kids to adult beginners. So soft and doesn't give you forearm bruising or slapping.
customer_reviews.author: psvan

customer_reviews.title: Great for young, beginning volleyballers.  Trust the Tachikara brand and don't buy the cheap stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I love Tachikara balls. I coach a junior high volleyball team. These are great balls for the younger kids who are learning (5-6th grade). I plan on only using these for young kids this year, but even my older kids love these balls. That little bit less weight makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: jerzmaster

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using this ball almost daily for months, ball still remains in excellent condition. i have bought other voleyballs in the recent past and they have deteriorated very quickly. This ball is durable and highly recommended for voleyball practice
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Not as long as regulation
customer_reviews.text: The product is a little flimsy and not as long as my last one, but it gets the job done. Does not glow at night either. A little disappointed but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Vincent S.

customer_reviews.title: great for kids volleyball league
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as my kids joined a local volleyball league. This ball matches the league requirements for their age range (under 8). Great to have different color options, we purchased two different colors.
customer_reviews.author: d808Top Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and bright color
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this. It's the same ball that she uses in practice. We had her teammates and coaches "autograph" the ball and gave it to her as a keepsake of her first competitive year. Be advised that this ball comes deflated. This was noted in the product description, but I almost missed that detail.
customer_reviews.author: T Hale

customer_reviews.title: Softer and lighter than the standard.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter swears that this is a lot better than another ball I had gotten her last year. This is much softer and lighter... and does not "hurt". So, I guess it was worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: lighter, soft, great for my 5-year-old
customer_reviews.text: A great option to teach younger kids. It is very soft and lighter than official volleyballs. If your kids are ready for real volleyball games, I'd go with the official ball since this one is lighter. If your kids are young and just starting, this is the best ball I found to pepper and learn the basics. It is a bit softer and lighter than Mikasa's official beach volleyball (vls300)
customer_reviews.author: Avishai

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball for my daughter for her 4 week volleyball training for the month of April and she took the ball to practice yesterday and had it aired up by her coach only for the ball to keep slowly deflating her coach told her it has a small leak somewhere. Please help what do I need to do to get it replaced it has her name on it in permanent maker. -love the ball it is exactly what we wanted other then it will not stay aired up(slow leak somewhere)
customer_reviews.author: smart117

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I thought that it was supposed to glow in the dark as it does in the pictures. IT DOES NOT! Had I known it wasn't going to, I would have purchased something else.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great volleyballs for beginners
customer_reviews.text: These volleyballs are great to use with youth that are beginning to learn to play volleyball. I purchased 4 of these for a youth group to play with and they have preformed great. They are lighter than regular volleyballs which is nice for kids who are learning to pass and serve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best volleyball for young players
customer_reviews.text: Tachikara Volley-Lite is the best ball for younger (6th grade and less) players. It handles like a regular ball except it is lighter. The cover has good feel and wears well. The blue and red are easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: Nicer Than Average

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: These balls are great for beginners. They can stand up to pretty much everything. I plan to order more for my youth team.
customer_reviews.author: Liana Woods

customer_reviews.title: Tachikara Volle-lite volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Very soft feel to the ball. So far its held up for the abuse that my daughter has put the ball through. would buy again. Good price on volleyball
customer_reviews.author: dschmidt74

customer_reviews.title: Great volleyball for young learners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this volleyball for my 5th grade daughter who is learning volleyball at school. Pink is her favorite color, so the color is perfect. It weighs slightly less than a standard volleyball, but this will be easier on her arms and fingers as she is still young and learning the basics. Tachikara is my favorite volleyball brand. Great price for these balls on Amazon too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chung

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter just learning to play!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter just started playing volleyball, so we ordered this ball for her to practice. It is so soft and the pink color is so pretty! I think it is the perfect volleyball to learn with, it doesn't hurt her arms when she hits it and it's nice and light!
customer_reviews.author: EECallahan

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 10 year old. Everyone at practice loves her ball because it is so light. Stays clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Drayden

customer_reviews.title: Awful deflated and no new box package or anything!! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Birthday gift and it came in small box not even inflated and with nothing to inflate it with!!!!! Now I have to give this 10 year old a deflated volleyball!!! Ridiculous!! It should note doesn’t come with and package and cones deflated so people can’t even tell if it a new ball or used.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Well made volleyball
customer_reviews.text: My 9-year old daughter just started playing volleyball. This ball is very well made and I hope it can last a good couple of years. Having a ball at home allows us to do a little weekly practice at home. The ball feels comfortable with just the right amount of bounce. My daughter can play for about half an hour before her arms get all red. She will get better as she is more used to it.
customer_reviews.author: john c

customer_reviews.title: Volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Great volleyball. Just make sure you have a pump at home as it comes deflated.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality youth volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. We already had one Volley Lite and needed several more for a 5th grade volleyball team. They are perfect for 10 year olds and younger.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron McClain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kids volleyball
customer_reviews.text: The ball comes deflated and wrinkled, which I expected. Once you pump it to the recommend size, the wrinkles go away. It’s the perfect volleyball for my daughter whose 10 and she love the green color.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Real deal
customer_reviews.text: Great ball and exactly what was expected of a volley-lite ball. The color is bright and the ball appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 year old daughter for her travel volleyball and its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rizz

customer_reviews.title: Great starter ball
customer_reviews.text: There is not a better Volleyball brand than Tachikara. If you are interested in getting your child interested in volleyball, than this is the greatest ball to use. Our 5th grade daughter was not ready for the official weight and hardness of a regulation volleyball. It hurt her forearms when bumping the ball. This lite ball gave her the confidence and worked her arm strength up enough that as a 6th grader she is ready to move on to the regulation weight and herdness ball.
customer_reviews.author: techie wannabe

customer_reviews.title: Great ball. High quality and very light
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for little kids to mess around with and for school kids learning volleyball. Along with quality construction, it has a great feel.
customer_reviews.author: lockedout

customer_reviews.title: A good choice as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a gift to a teenage girl. She’s real happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: happy2live

customer_reviews.title: Soft training ball
customer_reviews.text: Great beginning ball truly is soft and perfect for early training.
customer_reviews.author: jml

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball for my 7 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, fast shipment. Got it for my 7 year old for indoor play/practice. We both love it and the fact that it is pink makes it that much better! Great quality and as described.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: lightweight
customer_reviews.text: great lightweight volleyball for the little ones or those new to volleyball...it gets arms used to having a ball constantly hit it. my daughter just adores practicing her passing!
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: Beach Volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Decent volleyball for the beach and outdoor play. Deflates slightly over a few days while just sitting around so needs to be pumped before each use. Somewhat annoying.
customer_reviews.author: SherBear

customer_reviews.title: Not SOFT
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, we thought we were getting a microfiber volleyball due the the description. When arrived, it is def a leather one. We will still use, just not what we were hoping for. The girls on the volleyball team prefer the softer volleyballs.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fun
customer_reviews.text: I thought that a soft volleyball would not fly like a normal ball, but this ball behaves exactly as a regular ball, but with a very light feel. There is no harshness and anyone can play with it for hours. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: We use this to practice at home. Not sure how it compares to the ones at the school but it does look nice and isn’t really uncomfortably hard like the cheaper ones are. So I’d say it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: RBaker

customer_reviews.title: and she's already gotten hours of enjoyment out of it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter when she joined the volleyball team. It works as expected,and she's already gotten hours of enjoyment out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nonprofman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality balls
customer_reviews.text: Great quality balls. I have 7 total for the team I coach. These are a great weight for younger children and perfect for them to learn with. They are lighter and don't sting quite as much as standard volleyballs. The price seems high, but they are worth it for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: angTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Does not glow in dark. At all.
customer_reviews.text: This is a yellow day-glo net. In darkness, it's invisible.
customer_reviews.author: MD NYC

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light for our kids
customer_reviews.text: Kids love how it does not hurt as much when I crush it at them.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk P Kosel

customer_reviews.title: Great youth volleyball!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for youth Volleyball! Recommended by the coach, and we love it, softer than the traditional volleyball. Held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Best volleyball
customer_reviews.text: This ball is very soft and easy to serve. No sting!
customer_reviews.author: LexMom

customer_reviews.title: Good practice ball
customer_reviews.text: We use this to practice in the off season. It looks and feels like the competition balls that we use. Inflates and holds air well, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Nice light and soft volleyball, perfect for practicing.
customer_reviews.text: This is the ball my 14 year old daughter uses in practice. It's lighter than a standard volleyball and is soft on the arms. Great for learning and practicing the basics of the game. We take it everywhere with us and if we have a few minutes, we just practice passing and setting.
customer_reviews.author: TomG

customer_reviews.title: great ball
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great and has been used for tournament game play also (for ages 8-9)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft volleyball, great for young children
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, bought it for my 10 year old daughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great product for children learning volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Best volleyball brand out there! This product is great for young kids learning how to play. It is a little softer and lighter than the regulation size volleyball. I would recommend it for any child learning to play.
customer_reviews.author: ACEM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. It just came with less air, luckily for me I have a pump. We have been using this one for more than a few years. Maybe they do not last too long but very happy the ball. Our league has purchase more than 20 of these and do not see any reason to change the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5th grade daughter for rec volleyball. It must be a good ball because the entire team prefers this ball over all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vball for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great volleyball and my daughter (age 9 and playing her first year) loved that should could pick one that featured her team's colors. It seems well made and good quality. It arrived inflated and ready to go right out of the box. She says she can't tell the difference (other than the name and colors) between this one and the ones they use at her club.
customer_reviews.author: loves animals

customer_reviews.title: Love our volley- lite!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second volley lite- definitely our favorite volleyball
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for young players
customer_reviews.text: Definitely welcome the money. Soft touch. Easy to use. Nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great soft, light volleyball
customer_reviews.text: This volleyball serves a few purposes well: (1) it is soft and light which makes it great for new players (2) it is great for practicing fundamentals for non-beginner players (3) it comes in many different colors This volleyball is a big HIT just waiting to happen once you SET yourself up with it so don't PASS on it!
customer_reviews.author: drvck

customer_reviews.title: I have a 7th grade son with lots of friends ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7th grade son with lots of friends who come to play out door volleyball. This volleyball is lite weight and doesn't hurt their arms.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Kberg

customer_reviews.title: perfect for kids learning how to play
customer_reviews.text: takes the sting out of the ball. this is perfect for kids learning to play.
customer_reviews.author: Pete I.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a new player or someone who doesn't like ...
customer_reviews.text: This "lite" volleyball is fabulous. Great for a new player or someone who doesn't like the sting of a regular volleyball. It plays like a regular volleyball but gentle on the arms because it's so light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect ball for ages 8-12ish
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect ball for ages 8-12ish. They are soft and easy to hit without hurting. Came really deflated and I was worried it wouldn't round out properly, but it did.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for our little players
customer_reviews.text: This ball is great for littles!! It’s soft but still a REAL volleyball - My YMCA girls use this ball until 5th grade.
customer_reviews.author: Jana hammer

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball for Young Arms
customer_reviews.text: Growing up, Tachikaras were the coveted balls, and so I was excited to see my daughter's rec league using these. It's soft, well balanced, and the weight takes it a little easier on the small arms. She loves to practice with her "real" ball.
customer_reviews.author: Wawro Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Beginners!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old was asking for a volleyball as she likes to come along to my adult league games. I did a lot of research and ended up deciding on this one. We love it and it is perfect for her and her age. It is a great starter volleyball as it is lighter than a normal one and very solf. Would highly recommend for children under 10 or 12!
customer_reviews.author: kmw

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for kids to hit around with. Soft and doesn’t hurt as much as a regular volleyball. Product as pictured. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping and quality product
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it works perfect and was available in her school colors
customer_reviews.author: john norris

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I strongly recommend this ball if you ever hear a complaint that a volleyball is hurting a players arms. Really nice ball.
customer_reviews.author: Husker Nation

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why but air pressure goes low in a couple of days
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but air pressure goes low in a couple of days
customer_reviews.author: Sk

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: I coach 4th grade volleyball. We practice twice a week for two hours and I have not had one girl tell me their arms hurt after practice. They do float during a serve more and pass a little differently so make sure you are using Volley Lites during scrimmages or games. They are 25% lighter and very soft, great ball for under 12 to practice and play with.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING LIGHT BALL, FUN TO PLAY WITH!
customer_reviews.text: The light ball is amazing, and fun to play with! You can make one handed shots that you just couldn't do with the heavy regulation ball, and there is less danger of anybody getting hurt, especially in mixed groups. I highly recommend this ball!
customer_reviews.author: Dkfonz

customer_reviews.title: Good Ball.
customer_reviews.text: My girls started playing volleyball last year, seems like our local 12U leagues use this lightweight ball. This ball is more expensive than I'd like, but it is what it is. It's well made, and has stood up well to us practicing outside with it. Good ball.
customer_reviews.author: CommonSenseTest

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft, lite for my 9 year-old
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year-old daughter just started playing volleyball and loves to play but was complaining that her forearms would hurt. The Volleylite ball is very soft and light and helps lessen the blow to younger kids. I know that overtime if she keeps playing it won't bother her anymore, but this ball really helps that initial transition for younger players. Plus, since it's lighter it's easier to serve it over the net, which is a challenge for players at this age (not enough power to get it over the net from the back line).
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hodson

customer_reviews.title: Soft!
customer_reviews.text: The volleyball is extremely lightweight and soft so it does not hurt arms when hitting; perfect for a younger player learning volleyball.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Ching

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners--soft, well-made.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike--maybe add how much air should be added for a beginner player?
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4 year old niece to start LOVING volleyball. :)
customer_reviews.author: Linda Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves playing volleyball and this is a great beginners ball.
customer_reviews.author: Dana K McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Best volleyball for kid
customer_reviews.text: Best volleyball ever! For my 7 year old daughter, tried different brand in store, but too hard for her. Happen to see this one at her friend home, very soft touch, good size, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Volleyball- #1 when learning the basics
customer_reviews.text: This volleyball is very great for practice bumping, setting, spiking, and serving. This ball is used in many leagues and I highly recommend it for new players. It helps to learn the basics of the wonderful sport of VOLLEYBALL!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Nugent

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Product is as it's says it is. Good quality and nice and soft. The only thing beware it come flat you will need a pump to pump it up before you can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bomers

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball, better price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the red white and black ball for over $10 cheaper than I could find locally. I didn't read that is came deflated, but no problem once we found a needle.
customer_reviews.author: BretVz

customer_reviews.title: It's too hard
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my twin girls. The ball is too hard for them to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Prezwodek

customer_reviews.title: Great starter volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old daughter who joined a team during the summer. Its perfect for her and is softer on her hands than a traditional VB. Highly recommend for kids learning to play. Shipping was fast. I paid an extra $3.99 to get it next day, one day quicker than Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Daughter and I LOVE this ball
customer_reviews.text: Daughter and I LOVE this ball. Sassy and pink... like her, but also strong and durable like her as well! :)
customer_reviews.author: Christie A. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: They are great for kids learning to play the game
customer_reviews.text: If you've played volleyball at all, you're probably familiar with volley-lite volleyballs. They are great for kids learning to play the game. My 8 year old loves hers and the pink color is a hit. Good ball at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, my daughter love it! Its soft because is a ball for beginners in this sport so it's perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Lisandra

product_meta.title: Tachikara Volley-Lite Additional Colors (EA)
product_meta.description: Volley-Lite white volleyball with Sensi-Tech cover. Regulation size but lighter weight allows those age 12 and under to develop their skills.
feature_bullets: This ball is sold and shipped deflated.
Sensi-Tech@ soft synthetic cover for just the right touch.
Tomorrow's Olympians will be playing today with the Volley-Lite.
Ball ships deflated. Inflation is required. Pump not included.
